title: Love after Marriage: No Escape from My Billionaire Husband - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adult   Drama   Josei   Mature   Romance
tags: Acting   Arranged Marriage   Betrayal   Businessmen   Confinement   Divorce   Female Protagonist   First-time Interc**rse   Forced into a Relationship   Forced Marriage   Handsome Male Lead   Love at First Sight   Marriage   Modern Day   Personality Changes   Possessive Characters   Pregnancy   R*pe   S*x Friends   Unrequited Love   Younger Love Interests
author: 乌龟鹿
description:
On her wedding anniversary, he indifferently threw her a divorce agreement. 

Two years later, she changed gorgeously and swore not to be his woman.

When quarreling, she said: “Li Jinting, you just wait to make handjobs for a lifetime!” 

But her swear eventually turned into something else: “Em don’t…don’t do that…Li Jinting, enough!”>
